title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers

records.QueryText: Information regarding seed treatment in wheat for TERMITE ?
records.KccAns: Seed treatment in wheat for TERMITE - treat the seed with 4ml CHLORPYRIPHOS 20EC or 6ml REGENT 5SC (fipronil) per kg seed and dry it in shade.

records.QueryText: TELL ME WEED CONTROL IN SARSO
records.KccAns: Spray the fenoxaprop-p-ethyl 750 ml per hectare after 20 days of germination to control weed in the standing crop of mustard.

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT TAKING SOIL SAMPLE ?

records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know about varieties of Bengal gram crop?
records.KccAns: recommended gram variety J.G.14, Jaki 9218, J.G.63, J.G. 412, J.G. 130, J.G.16, J.G. 11, J.G. 322, J.G.218, J.G. 74, and J.G. 315 are Bengal gram crop verities.
